Body:
"""
    Check that valid parameter arguments are accepted.
    """
assert_no_warnings(ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7, A_s=
    2.1e-09, n_s=0.96)
assert_no_warnings(ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7, A_s=
    2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, Omega_k=0.05)
assert_no_warnings(ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7, A_s=
    2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, Neff=2.046)
assert_no_warnings(ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7, A_s=
    2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, Neff=3.046, m_nu=0.06)
assert_no_warnings(ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7, A_s=
    2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, w0=-0.9)
assert_no_warnings(ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7, A_s=
    2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, w0=-0.9, wa=0.1)
assert_no_warnings(ccl.Cosmology, h=0.7, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, A_s=
    2.1e-09, n_s=0.96)
assert_no_warnings(ccl.Cosmology, h=0.7, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, A_s=
    2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, mu_0=0.1, sigma_0=0.1)
